input: observation 1: The rich man decided to go on a trip around the world. [SEP] observation 2: He handed out tickets to all his friends so they could join him. [SEP] hypothesis 1: The rich man wanted to be isolated on the trip. [SEP] hypothesis 2: The rich man wanted company on the trip.

observation 1: I did not have any friends for a while after I started college. [SEP] observation 2: Now she is my girlfriend and we are happy. [SEP] hypothesis 1: I finally met a female after almost giving up. [SEP] hypothesis 2: I finally met a boyfriend after almost giving up.
